Data Structures | Macros | Enumerations
Random
Stratify OS » Device Interface

Detailed Description

This is the interface for accessing random number generator devices.

Data Structures

struct  random_info_t
 Random info. More...
 
struct  random_attr_t
 Random attributes. More...
 

Macros

#define I_RANDOM_GETINFO
 
#define I_RANDOM_SETATTR
 

Enumerations

enum  {
  RANDOM_FLAG_SET_SEED,
  RANDOM_FLAG_IS_PSEUDO,
  RANDOM_FLAG_IS_TRUE,
  RANDOM_FLAG_ENABLE,
  RANDOM_FLAG_DISABLE
}
 

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ I_RANDOM_GETINFO

#define I_RANDOM_GETINFO

This request reads the random generator information.

Example:

random_info_t info;
ioctl(fildes, I_RANDOM_GETINFO, &info);

◆ I_RANDOM_SETATTR

#define I_RANDOM_SETATTR

Requests the hardware to write the random generator attributes.

Example:

random_attr_t attr;
attr.o_flags = RANDOM_FLAG_SET_SEED;
attr.seed = 10;
ioctl(fildes, I_RANDOM_SETATTR, &attr);

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ anonymous enum

anonymous enum
Enumerator
RANDOM_FLAG_SET_SEED 

Set the seed using I_RANDOM_SETATTR

RANDOM_FLAG_IS_PSEUDO 

Set in info flags is generator is pseudorandom

RANDOM_FLAG_IS_TRUE 

Set in info flags is generator is a true random number generator

RANDOM_FLAG_ENABLE 

Enables the random number generator

RANDOM_FLAG_DISABLE 

Disables the random number generator
